name: bittersweet (sunnydaysadness)
description:
is it a weird timeloop, purgatory, or his life flashing between his eyes- calroy doesn't know. there's more than a knife following him as he tries to escape,  the latter being something which you can help or hinder. escape to where exactly, though?

well. whatever awaits him. (or; calroy crueller and the people who haunt him.)

this game was made for @ANDROMELITE on twitter, for the d20 exchange circa twenty twenty one .  click on the text (and images) to progress through and restart; bittersweet has six endings (one "secret"), ten achievements,  and music.
